actions.recommendation: One episode of chest pain recently. If this reoccurs I advise you to come in for a check up.
Edwin based on your history of chest pain and some abnormalities noted on your ECG, please see a cardiologist to investigate further.
Consider a follow-up with your primary care physician for ongoing management and monitoring.
To reduce your risk of cardiovascular and other chronic disease it is recommended that you keep your BMI < 25 and your waist to height ratio < 50%.
Edwin, based on your history of chest pain and some abnormalities noted on your ECG, please see a cardiologist to investigate further.
Consider a follow-up with your primary care physician for ongoing management and monitoring.
Consider a cardiac stress test to further evaluate your chest pain.
Consider a lipid profile and fasting blood glucose test to evaluate your risk factors for cardiovascular disease.
Consider a follow-up with a dietitian or nutritionist to help manage your weight and diet.
